about_the_game:
Wake Cup is a casual clicker tower defence game with rogue-lite meta progression.




The economy must flow! Wake up and fight against the flock of tired zombeans and keep them energised with a cup of coffee.



Build a resource chain to keep the coffee supplies running. Hatch cute Blobista eggs that pop on the maps and put them to work.

Wake up, brew coffee, sell, collect likes, loose and repeat! But don't worry. Failing is important to replay levels and get extra cash to improve your business with a variety of upgrades in the shop.
